about_the_game:
Final Frost thrusts you into a merciless, icy world where survival is a privilege, not a right. In this open-ended simulation, the Earth has been ravaged by a catastrophic alien invasion, transforming it into a frozen wasteland. As a survivor awakened from cryostasis, your identity and path are yours to forge in a landscape that offers no quarter.

Create your own story from the ashes of civilization, choosing how to navigate the treacherous terrains and the fractured societies that have adapted to this harsh new reality. Will you align with the resourceful Iceridge Federation, find solitude in the Mountain Enclaves, delve into the mysteries with the Aurora Order, or master the snow with the Avalanch Legion? Each choice spins a new thread in your tale, with every decision impacting your journey and the fate of those you meet.

Manage scarce resources, face moral dilemmas, and build or dismantle relationships as you explore the remnants of a world where technology and nature have become indistinguishably entwined. Your strategies will determine not only your survival but also the future of human remnants clinging to existence.

Final Frost is not just about surviving the cold—it's about redefining what it means to live in a world where every dawn could be your last. How will you write your story in the snow?

content_descriptors.notes: Standard violence in combat, slightly unrealistic, but very little gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core 64-bit
  • Graphics: Pixel shader 5.0 capable card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core 64-bit
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: **Recommended install to SSD for optimum performance
